history.proof: intros A R. unfold same_relation. split. - intros x y H. qsimpl time: 2 use: compond_relation. - intros x y H. qsimpl time: 2 use: compond_relation.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), same_relation A (compond_relation eq R) R

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For Cj: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit
Inductive compond_relation (A : Type) (R1 R2 : relation A) : relation A := compond_intro : forall x y z : A, R1 x y -> R2 y z -> compond_relation R1 R2 x z For compond_relation: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For compond_intro: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For compond_relation: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For compond_intro: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _]
same_relation : forall A : Type, relation A -> relation A -> Prop
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive eq (A : Type) (x : A) : A -> Prop := eq_refl : x = x For eq: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For eq_refl, when applied to no arguments: Arguments A, x are implicit and maximally inserted For eq_refl, when applied to 1 argument: Argument A is implicit For eq: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For eq_refl: Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
compond_assoc : forall R1 R2 R3 : relation ?A, same_relation ?A (compond_relation (compond_relation R1 R2) R3) (compond_relation R1 (compond_relation R2 R3)) where ?A : [ |- Type]
compond_eq_right : forall R : relation ?A, same_relation ?A (compond_relation R eq) R where ?A : [ |- Type]
clos_r_clos_rt : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), inclusion A (clos_refl A R) (clos_refl_trans A R)
clos_rt_clos_rst : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), inclusion A (clos_refl_trans A R) (clos_refl_sym_trans A R)
clos_rst_is_equiv : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), equivalence A (clos_refl_sym_trans A R)
clos_rt_is_preorder : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), preorder A (clos_refl_trans A R)
clos_trans_transp_permute : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x y : A), transp A (clos_trans A R) x y < -> clos_trans A (transp A R) x y
clos_rt_idempotent : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), inclusion A (clos_refl_trans A (clos_refl_trans A R)) (clos_refl_trans A R)
clos_rst_idempotent : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), inclusion A (clos_refl_sym_trans A (clos_refl_sym_trans A R)) (clos_refl_sym_trans A R)
compond_relation_inclusion : forall R1 R2 R3 R4 : relation ?A, inclusion ?A R1 R2 -> inclusion ?A R3 R4 -> inclusion ?A (compond_relation R1 R3) (compond_relation R2 R4) where ?A : [ |- Type]
compond_relation_proper = fun (A : Type) (x y : relation A) (H : same_relation A x y) (x0 y0 : relation A) (H0 : same_relation A x0 y0) => match H with | conj H1 H2 => match H0 with | conj H3 H4 => conj (compond_relation_inclusion x y x0 y0 H1 H3) (compond_relation_inclusion y x y0 x0 H2 H4) end end : forall A : Type, Proper (same_relation A ==> same_relation A ==> same_relation A) compond_relation Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scope is [type_scope]
Ring_theory.ARadd_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (radd x rO) x
Field_theory.AF_AR : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
same_relation_spec : forall a1 a2 : relation ?A, same_relation ?A a1 a2 < -> pointwise_relation ?A (pointwise_relation ?A iff) a1 a2 where ?A : [ |- Type]
app_same_relation : forall (R1 R2 : relation ?A) (a1 a2 : ?A), same_relation ?A R1 R2 -> R1 a1 a2 < -> R2 a1 a2 where ?A : [ |- Type]
InitialRing.gen_phiPOS1 : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> BinNums.positive -> R
InitialRing.gen_phiPOS : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> BinNums.positive -> R
equiv_sym : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), equivalence A R -> symmetric A R
preord_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), preorder A R -> reflexive A R
equiv_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), equivalence A R -> reflexive A R
per_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Relation_Definitions.PER A R -> transitive A R
ord_antisym : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), order A R -> antisymmetric A R
ord_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), order A R -> reflexive A R
preord_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), preorder A R -> transitive A R
equiv_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), equivalence A R -> transitive A R
per_sym : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Relation_Definitions.PER A R -> symmetric A R
ord_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), order A R -> transitive A R
rt_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl_trans A R x x
rstn1_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x x
rtn1_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x x
rt1n_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl_trans_1n A R x x
r_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl A R x x
rst1n_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x x
rst_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A), clos_refl_sym_trans A R x x
InitialRing.same_gen : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : BinNums.positive, req (InitialRing.gen_phiPOS1 rI radd rmul x) (InitialRing.gen_phiPOS rI radd rmul x)
PeanoNat.Nat.recursion_wd : forall Aeq : relation ?A, Proper (Aeq ==> (eq ==> Aeq ==> Aeq) ==> eq ==> Aeq) PeanoNat.Nat.recursion where ?A : [ |- Type]
BinNat.N.recursion_wd : forall Aeq : relation ?A, Proper (Aeq ==> (eq ==> Aeq ==> Aeq) ==> eq ==> Aeq) BinNat.N.recursion where ?A : [ |- Type]
Build_preorder : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), reflexive A R -> transitive A R -> preorder A R
Relation_Definitions.Build_PER : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), symmetric A R -> transitive A R -> Relation_Definitions.PER A R
EnvRing.Mjump_pred_double : forall (R : Type) (rI : R) (rmul : R -> R -> R) (M : EnvRing.Mon) (p : BinNums.positive) (l : Env.Env R), EnvRing.Mphi rI rmul (Env.jump (BinPos.Pos.pred_double p) (Env.tail l)) M = EnvRing.Mphi rI rmul (Env.jump (BinNums.xO p) l) M

```coq
intros A R. unfold same_relation. split.
- intros x y H. unfold compond_relation. intros x0 z Hx Hy. apply Hx in H. apply Hy in H. assumption.
- intros x y H. unfold compond_relation in H. split.
  + intros a b c H1 H2. apply H in H1. apply H in H2. assumption.
  + intros c d e H1 H2. apply H in H1. apply H in H2. assumption.
Qed.
```
